entities.description: The main character, Harry, is mentioned as remembering the sign over the Welcome Witch's desk.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is one of Harry's friends and is being diagnosed by a medieval wizard.

entities.name: welcome witch
entities.description: The Welcome Witch is mentioned as having her desk on the fifth floor.

relationships.description: Harry visited the Welcome Witch's desk to remember where the fifth floor was.
A medieval wizard diagnosed Ron with spattergroit.
